turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Jamuria (community development block).
turn.1: How many mouzas in Jamuria CD Block had drinking water facilities in 2013-14?
turn.2: 43 mouzas in Jamuria CD Block had drinking water facilities in 2013-14.
turn.3: How many fair price shops were established in the block?
turn.4: There were 37 fertiliser depots, 3 seed stores and 34 fair price shops in the CD Block.
turn.6: It is in the heart of the coal mining zone.
turn.7: Is illegal mining of coal a problem in the block?
turn.8: With plenty of coal seams near the surface, illegal mining has been a long-standing problem in the area.
turn.9: Are land disputes a problem in the block?
turn.10: See also – Sripur Area, Satgram Area, Kunustoria Area and Kenda Area of Eastern Coalfields Although the Bargadari Act of 1950 recognised the rights of bargadars to a higher share of crops from the land that they tilled, it was not implemented fully.
turn.11: Why is the act not implemented?
turn.12: Large tracts, beyond the prescribed limit of land ceiling, remained with the rich landlords.
